text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated API Faults and Alarm Delays>
We are investigating increased faults for CloudWatch alarms APIs and delays in processing some alarms in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated API Faults and Alarm Delays>
We continue to investigate increased faults for CloudWatch alarms APIs and delays in processing some alarms in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Elevated API Faults and Alarm Delays>
We have identified the cause of increased faults for CloudWatch alarms APIs and delays in processing some alarms in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region and continue to work towards resolution.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Elevated API Faults and Alarm Delays>
We have remediated the increased faults for CloudWatch alarms APIs and delays in processing some alarms in the US-GOV-WEST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
